General.Name: Brisanet Participacoes SA
General.Description: Brisanet Participações S.A. offers broadband, fixed telephony, cable TV, and mobile telephony services in Brazil. The company offers telecommunications services; switched fixed telephony services; voice over internet protocol services; equipment rentals; computer services; fiber optic and radio network installation services; pay television; cable pay-television; and monitoring services, as well as information technology technical support, maintenance, and services. It also engages in wholesale, retail, and import of cameras and monitoring materials, and computer and telecommunication equipment; wholesale, retail, import, and rental of equipment for electronic monitoring; retail trade of telephony and communication equipment; and maintenance of electronic monitoring equipment. In addition, the company manufactures pre-molded reinforced concrete structures; and installation and assembly of electronic equipment. Further, it provides intermediation and agency services; non-customizable and customizable computer system and development; added value services; data processing, application, and internet hosting services; and office services and administrative support. Brisanet Participações S.A. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Pereiro, Brazil.
